More about me

Hi, Welcome to my portfolio!

I'm Selen. Nice to meet you.

An enthusiastic self-taught a detail-oriented Front-end Developer with a strong desire to learn and contribute to innovative web projects. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving myself. Since decided to begin my journey as a self-learner, I enrolled courses and I developed 5 different user-friendly and responsive projects. I keep going to learn more and implement more project!

My interest in web developing and design helps me find creative solutions to technical challenges and develop visually beautifully websites. My project experience spans a variety of exciting ventures, from building dynamic and interactive interfaces for hobby planners to creating personalized content platforms for tracking movies and books. Each project reflects my dedication to excellence and my commitment to delivering high-quality results.In addition, my technical knowledges are accumulating day by day, and I am keep loving what I do.

I invite you to explore my portfolio and discover the projects I've worked on. You can also find me on LinkedIn and GitHub to learn more about my skills and experiences.Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you!

Frontend Developer

I revel in the process of crafting digital experiences from the ground up, turning abstract ideas into vibrant, user-friendly interfaces that come to life in the browser. Each line of code I write is a step towards creating seamless and immersive web applications, fueling my passion for innovation and creativity in the digital realm.

Languages I speak:

Html5 CSS-Bootstrap-Tailwind Sass JS-React

Building an application from scratch

Skilled in crafting responsive and intuitive web applications

Capable of integrating APIs to enhance functionality and user interaction

Knowledgeable in version control tools like Git

Experienced in using frameworks and libraries including Bootstrap, Tailwind, SASS/SCSS, and jQuery.

Translate creative software design concepts and ideas into reality using front-end technology

Familiar with back-end database integration and API integration

Image Processing

I'm drawn to the intricacies of coding and the ability to extract valuable insights from images, allowing me to delve into the depths of our world's spatial data. With each line of code I write, I uncover new dimensions of our world, fueling my curiosity and driving me to explore its endless possibilities.

Languages I speak:

Python (Numpy, Keras, Tensorflow, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, OpenCV)

Extract some useful information from image

Analysing and manipulating the image

Image segmentation for put attention on the more important parts of the image

Image Restoration operation
